All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Booking
A class which aggregates from class Structure that is responsible for creating a booking for a playground after the playground owner accepts the player's request to book his playground.
GoFoo
The main class function where we will test the classes implemented and it is responsible for showing the main menu options to the user.
Person
A parent class that has the personal information of a player or playground owner as its attributes in which class Player or playgroundOwner will inherit these attributes when an objects from them are created by the user.
Player
A sub class PlagroundOwner takes the personal information of a player that registers as a player which inherits from class person, then this information will be saved in the database(Structure class) at the array list of players.
Playground
A class responsible for making a playground and takes its information with a function to add rating to the playground.
PlaygroundOwner
A sub class PlagroundOwner takes the personal information of an owner that registers as a playground owner which inherits from class person, then this information will be saved in the database(Structure class) at the array list of owners.
Request
A class responsible for creating a request to book a play ground which aggregates with class Structure when the user as a player chooses to request a playground.
Structure
A class structure is acting as a data base which stores the list of all added: playground owners, players, playgrounds with the specific owner of each playground, all the requests made by a player and a list for playgrounds that haven't been approved by administrator yet.
UserInterface
This class is to be called in the main function and it is responsible for showing the sub menus depending on the user choice for the main menu and the function that will be called for each choice.
